entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Peters Bay

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 01:00 AM AST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow changing to snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 late in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
